\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7b8b965ad4bca0e41ab51de7b31363a1]%mdk
$n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={134}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[190e98cf0a6ba7a8b6ed2eafbfb4e8ea]%mdk
$\geq 1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={134}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a638856c8bcaa3c8f1b5a67911082acc]%mdk
$C=SEQ(Z_{\geq1})$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={134}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[36219a14f7414d3c3884512d6012ec17]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={136}
 C(z)=\frac{1}{1-Z_{\geq1}(z)}=\frac{1}{1-\frac{z}{1-z}}=\frac{1-z}{1-2z}.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={138}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[4bb8eae0518784707e4f9d6a8d60e295]%mdk
$[z^n]C(z)=2^{n-1}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={145}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[6ab6af6d3b29917fa077422bcdbe8917]%mdk
$A=\{a_1,...,a_n\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={145}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[d7b3d4d027a16c9accb98d5edb20b0ce]%mdk
$PSET(A)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={145}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7fc56270e7a70fa81a5935b72eacbe29]%mdk
$A$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={145}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[709ffc465cba3b81153d16705a362a44]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={147}
PSET(a_1,\ldots,a_n) = (\emptyset+\{a_1\})\times(\emptyset+\{a_2\})\times\cdots\times(\emptyset + \{a_n\})
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={149}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[982db8730ecf63e661842efd71fd2e9c]%mdk
$P=PSET(A)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={149}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f5f7fbbfa195fd2927233b3c7907e8ab]%mdk
$P(z)=\prod(1+z)=(1+z)^n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={149}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8603ab863c9672a003e2c7d8bfd4978d]%mdk
$P(z)=\sum_{m=0}^nP_m z^m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={149}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ee4749c6216413f4bf62fc9a716aa8ae]%mdk
$P_m = {n \choose m}=\frac{n!}{m!(n-m)!}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={151}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[6f8f57715090da2632453988d9a1501b]%mdk
$m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={151}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7b8b965ad4bca0e41ab51de7b31363a1]%mdk
$n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={151}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a14e2c74172b1909afd0a1db63888220]%mdk
$P_m={n\choose m}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={156}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7fc56270e7a70fa81a5935b72eacbe29]%mdk
$A$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={156}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7fc56270e7a70fa81a5935b72eacbe29]%mdk
$A$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={156}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7fc56270e7a70fa81a5935b72eacbe29]%mdk
$A$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={156}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7b8b965ad4bca0e41ab51de7b31363a1]%mdk
$n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={156}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b403e1b8614a145573a3db818720a39d]%mdk
$\{a\in A | |a|=n\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={156}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[164ad8bb8e2c661d087405b5859a2b7f]%mdk
$S \subset A$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={156}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5dbc98dcc983a70728bd082d1a47546e]%mdk
$S$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={156}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ddb3b7aa5a2f873af875cfba0569493c]%mdk
$|S|$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={156}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[c1ab68d317b7b263fb9e31604987145d]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={158}
|S|=\sum_{a\in S}|a|.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[4cb54a944f8a0e8fbae5c9616bae2a80]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={162}
P_{\leq n} = \{S\subset A||S|\leq n\} = \prod_{\substack{a\in A\\|a|\leq n}}(\emptyset+\{a\})
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={164}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[ab45d3bfb9608582184520ca67f39f00]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={166}
P_{\leq n}(z)=\prod_{m\leq n}(1+z^m)^{A_m}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={168}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[3629cc0747588690e68ca5fb992aa1e4]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={170}
P=PSET(A)=\prod_{a\in A}(\emptyset + \{a\})\text{, with }
P(z)=\prod_{m}(1+z^m)^{A_m} 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={173}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[404038143de4bcd0eac3862b09d1aa4e]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={175}
P(z) = \exp\Bigl(\sum_m A_m\log(1+z^m)\Bigr)
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={177}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3dbb58e988a8902ccc8d36f0cdad0a6a]%mdk
$\log(1+u)=\sum_{k\geq 1}(-1)^{k+1}\,\frac{u^k}{k}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={177}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[f62d677497515d977793cce77a1f1d21]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={180}
\begin{aligned}
P(z) & = \exp\Bigl(\sum_m A_m\sum_{k\geq1}(-1)^{k+1}\,\frac{z^{mk}}{k}\Bigr)\\
     & = \exp\Bigl(\sum_{k\geq1}\frac{(-1)^{k+1}}{k}\sum_m A_m (z^k)^m\Bigr)\\
     & = \exp\Bigl(\sum_{k\geq1}\frac{(-1)^{k+1}}{k} A(z^k)\Bigr) 
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={323}

\end{mdSnippets}
